text: Bien dommage mais Henri n est plus ce qu il était. On nous a servit des supposés hot-dogs steamé et frites poutine... Pain sec, dur, pas steamé du tout, poutine baignant dans trop de sauce pour sûrement cacher le goût de la vieille huile a friture.. Franchement infecte et décevant..

Prenez la Poutine italienne (une sauce bolognaise remplace la traditionnelle sauce Poutine au poivre, inhabituel mais succulent) et leur Hamburger Mammouth (il goûte exactement comme celui que vous préparez chez vous malgré le fromage Kraft utilisé). L'hôtesse qui nous a servis était très aimable, encline à nous conseiller et à nous raconter l'histoire des lieux. On y est allé sur un coup de tête, une heure de route plus tard, on ne l'a pas regretté ! Go, Montrealers, go !

Sometimes a girl just wants some junk food! Found this cute little diner while away on business and had to stop in! Open since 1957, this restaurant seemed stuck in time with its diner style orange seats and booths in one half of the restaurant, and old school tables and chairs in the other. The first half of this place is for counter ordering where you place your order and sit yourself like any fast food joint; the other half offers table service. 

The food is your typical fast food burgers and poutine, but you can also get smoked meat and some Greek specialities as well. I had a double cheeseburger and poutine and can attest that the poutine was one of the best I've had! The fries were fresh and hand cut, the curd cheese was on point, and the sauce was perfect; not too salty or sweet like others I've had. The burger though was dry and tasteless. 

This prices were very affordable and the service was a little slow; two waitresses for a lunch rush is just not enough! This place seems like the spot for late night eats and considering how long it's been around, they are surely doing something right.

Mmmmmh un grand classique de Joliette, de la Pizza au hot dog c'est toujours un agréable moment d'aller en famille au Henri, J'y vais depuis mon enfance et je n'ai jamais été déçu je vous le recommande fortement
